descriptionHtml:
CBBEv3 NeverNude Replacer 0.7

by LeeDavis

Installer by Caliente
Edited by LeeDavis


===================+++SPECIAL NOTE+++======================
+++PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION FULLY BEFORE POSTING COMMENTS+++

+++PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS. YOUR PC IS DIFFERENT AND MAY REQUIRE WORK-AROUNDS+++

+++ANY UPLOADED IMAGES THAT I FIND UNAPROPRIATE WILL BE REMOVED+++

FUTURE UPDATES MIGHT INCLUDE NEW CHOICES. IF YOU'D LIKE A MODEL ADDED. PLEASE COMMENT IN THE "MODEL REQUEST" DISCUSSION AND FOLLOW GUIDELINES, AND IF THE AUTHOR APPROVES (AND IT IS HIGHLY REQUESTED) I WILL ADD IT TO THE INSTALLER.

NEW NOTE(s):
Oct 2, 2012---New Update Available

June 4, 2012---New Update Available

May 31, 2012---New Teammember Announced
I'd like to welcome Thunderroar to the team.
I'm looking forward to making this mod more Versatile and Creative with his help.

May 27, 2012---New Installer TBA
-----I've added three new pics of the upcoming New Installer V2.0 I would Like some feedback on the new look and new features. I've started a new Discussion "New Installer" Please Comment on the look and any suggestions.

Here are the New Features:
---New Installer Look
---New Interface and Option Menus
---9 New Textures
---ZOOM feature for the picture

May 13, 2012---Current version is not Bodyslide compatible. Weight slider works in game, however. I'll update Description and comments with my progress.
May 11, 2012---The Downloaded version will appear as 1.0, but NMM will show the current version as 0.5BETA This is not an error. I intended it this way for testing. Thanks

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
REQUIREMENTS

CBBEv3 or higher.

This mod does not include any of CBBE Meshes or Textures.
It is assumed you already have them installed. If not, go here.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
UPDATE LOG:
V0.7
---Added Esmm40's Samurai-Meng NeverNude
---Added Anano's Layer Bikini
---Officially out of BETA

V0.6BETA
---New Installer Look
---New Interface and Option Menus
---9 New Textures
---ZOOM feature for the picture

V0.5BETA
---Original File
---====---====---====---====---====---====---
COMPATIBILITY

Currently not compatible with CBBE Bodyslide.
---I'm working on the issue and hope to have it resolved shortly.
This mod does not chance any new races' bodies. Only Vanilla races are effected

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
DESCRIPTION

This is a NeverNude replacer mod.

It allows for 4 (more to come) choices of Caliente's NeverNude body mesh. Includes 2 Lore-Friendly Meshes, and 2 Non-Lore Friendly Meshes.

Lore-Friendly: R18PN Inner wear A and B

Non-Lore Frienldy: Snezko Bikini clothes and Strapless Bikini (Esmm40 Textures)

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
INSTALLATION

FOR NMM ONLY. SELF-INSTALLER REQUIRES NMM.
(Manual installation is possible for ADVANCED USERS that are familiar with .nif and .dds files.)

1. Download via NMM button.
2. Select "CBBEv3 NeverNude Replacer BETA"
3. Click Install
4. Self-installer will open.
---A. Choose your style of NeverNude.
---B. Choose your style of Texture.
---C. Click install
5. If prompted to Overwrite (meshes "Femalebody_0.nif" and "Femalebody_1.nif") click "yes to all". This mod only replaces CBBEv3 meshes..no textures will be replaced.
If you have already installed any of the new Mesh textures, this will overwrite them as well. I will try to keep this mod up-to-date with all included meshes and CBBE.

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
UNINSTALL

Use NMM to uninstall "CBBEv3 Nevernude replacer" ONLY!
On my PC, any overwritten files, were replaced when using NMM.

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
LINKS:

Esmm40 Sexier Ebony Samurai-Meng Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8676
Anano Layer Bikini - UNP and CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7736

---====---====---====---====---====---====---
Special thanks.

Of Course, no doubt about it, with all due credit, it is with my great pleasure to thank, none other than...

CALIENTE

For his body meshes and textures,
For his AWSOME INSTALLER that I tweeked so much to make it work for me,
And for his time spent replying to my questions.

Also, thanks to:

NPR
Kurese
Snezko
Esmm40
Anano
Bethseda
TESNexus.com

AND ALL THOSE WHO FIND IT IN THEIR HEART TO ENDORSE THIS MOD.

------------THANK YOU--------------
